video.title: Suisei no Gargantia
video.synopsis: After falling through a wormhole, a space-dwelling teen mecha pilot awakes to find himself amid the inhabitants of a strange planet called ... Earth.

episodes.synopsis: Ensign Ledo, a pilot for the Galactic Alliance of Humankind, is injured in battle and wakes up on a planet populated by a primitive tribe of humans.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Just as Ledo learns the truth about Earth's current state, a distress call comes from Bellow's salvage ship.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Ledo is perceived as a threat and kept under guard, while Empress Lukkage’s pirate fleet races toward the Gargantia Fleet for revenge.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: While Chamber is put to work hauling heavy cargo to pay for damaging the hangar, Amy introduces Ledo to the knowledgable Dr. Oldham.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: After failing to find a job, Ledo is invited to a party where he finds himself on the run from overzealous hostesses.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: When Gargantia enters a Milky Way, Ledo gets his chance to catch fish underwater in a Yunboro, but he's unprepared for the job.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Ledo kills a whalesquid -- because of its similarities to the Hideauze -- without knowing that whalesquid are considered sacred.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: On his deathbed, Fleet Commander Fairlock entrusts Ridget with Gargantia, but his first task becomes trying to convince Shipmasters to stay.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Ledo and Chamber go deep sea diving to exterminate Earth's Hideauze and make a shocking discovery at the bottom of the ocean.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Ledo is still in shock over the revelation of the Hideauze’s origin, while Chamber remains committed to slaughtering them.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Ledo learns that his commander, Kugel, is on Earth and leads his own fleet. But when Ledo rejoins Kugel, he gets a nasty surprise.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: The horrors of Kugel's Fleet become even more apparent, and when Kugel targets Gargantia, Ledo is forced to make a tough decision.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: To save Gargantia, the outclassed Ledo and Chamber have to defeat Striker by any means possible, which includes a potentially suicidal move by Ledo.
episodes.title: Episode 13
